summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of North 128th Street from 1st Ave. Northeast to Fremont Ave., and certain other streets, avenues, alleys and easements, by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6197, under Ordinance No. 88029 as amended, and appropriating money from the Sewer Fund, and superseding said ordinance to the extent same is inconsistent.
